title: Harry Dunn death: Boris Johnson will 'personally' ask Trump to send back diplomat's wife over fatal crash
text:
Boris Johnson has said he will personally ask the White House to waive the immunity of a diplomat's wife who was allegedly involved in a fatal collision in the UK.

Anne Sacoolas, 42, left the UK after the death of Harry Dunn, 19, who was killed when a car collided with his motorbike near to RAF Croughton in Northamptonshire on August 27.

The Prime Minister said today he would be willing to personally ask Donald Trump to waive Ms Sacoolas' immunity if the issue cannot be resolved with the US ambassador.

Speaking to reporters during a visit to a hospital in Watford, the Prime Minister said: "I think everybody's sympathies are very much with the family of Harry Dunn and our condolences to them for...
description: Boris Johnson has said he will personally ask the White House to waive the immunity of a diplomat's wife who was allegedly involved in a fatal collision in the UK.
